name: Happy Hammer
description: You're happy, you're a hammer, now off you go. Spin through two action-packed levels and break every breakable object in sight, all while avoiding falling into the endless void lying below all known reality. Let physics become a suggestion as you bash around and propel yourself through the power of believing. Search through collectathon-like levels for a sense of purpose and fulfillment as you wonder what led to you being a smiling hammer hurtling through space.
